item.title: Build Gui for Powershell
item.author: contact@saggiehaim.net (Saggie Haim)
item.description: Hey everyone! Today I want to talk about GUI for PowerShell. You probably wonder why? PowerShell is all about the CLI and moving away from the GUI. but sometimes, a GUI for our scripts can be very useful. Every Company has HelpDesk team, other System Admins that don’t know PowerShell at all, or non-technical staff. While I will encourage them to learn, I can’t make them. As a result, I need to provide them with a GUI for some of the tools or solutions.
